sisterMsg1: Raj, hey! 🎉 Do you remember you promised to buy us IPL season pass for my birthday? 🎂 Well, the sale ends soon…
sisterMsg2: Hello, darling! 👋 Yeah, sure, I’ll get it right away.
seasonPassText: Until the end of sales: 4 days

friendMessage2: Hi, Raj 🤝 All good, I have bought the IPL season pass yesterday 🏏 I remember you and your sister were going too.
friendMessage3: Yeah, that's exactly my point 😭 here's the situation, two days until the end of the sale, and I'm tight on money right now....
friendMessage4: I see, can I help you?
